##Please download the following files: 

server.R, 

ui.R

##Then navigate to the folder where they're all located
Make sure Shiny is installed, then:
cut and paste the following code
````{r}
require(shiny)
shiny::runApp()
````

And you'll see the most beautiful Shiny App every created by a person, within a limited timeframe.
